questions.question: Which of the following is the classic algorithm for finding the shortest path in an unweighted graph?
Which algorithm is used to find the minimum spanning tree in a graph?
What is the time complexity of Kruskal's algorithm for finding the minimum spanning tree?
Which of the following is a classic problem that uses the maximum flow algorithm?
Which of the following problems can be solved using the Bellman-Ford algorithm?

answers.text: Finding the shortest path in graphs with negative weights
Finding the longest path in a graph
Finding a cycle in an undirected graph

questions.question: Which of the following problems is solved using the Depth-First Search (DFS) algorithm?
Which of the following problems is the basis of the traveling salesman problem (TSP)?

answers.text: Finding the longest path in a graph
Finding the maximum matching in a bipartite graph

questions.question: Which of the following is true about the graph coloring problem?

answers.text: It asks for the minimum number of colors needed to color a graph so no two adjacent vertices have the same color
It asks for the maximum number of edges in a graph
It is solved using Dijkstra's algorithm
It is a dynamic programming problem

questions.question: Which of the following problems is NP-complete?
Which of the following algorithms can be used to solve the minimum cut problem in a graph?
